mapper.select: select concat(c.극서 , ',', d.극북 - 2*(d.극북 - d.센터), ',', c.극서 + 2*(c.센터 - c.극서), ',', d.극북, ',', c.센터, ',', d.센터, ',', round(rand(convert(varbinary, newid()))*10, 1)) from [표준공시지가].[dbo].[20170109표준지공시지가] a inner join [지번주소].[dbo].[전국지번통합] b on (b.PNU=a.PNU1) inner join [좌표계].dbo.[가로축] c on (c.극서=b.극서) inner join [좌표계].dbo.[세로축] d on (d.극북=b.극북) where (a.PNU1 like '11%' or a.PNU1 like '42%') and 위도 is not null and c.레벨 = #{level} and d.레벨 = #{level} order by c.극서 asc

select concat(a.극서 , ',', b.극북 - 2*(b.극북 - b.센터), ',', a.극서 + 2*(a.센터 - a.극서), ',', b.극북, ',', a.센터, ',', b.센터, ',', round(rand(convert(varbinary, newid()))*10, 1)) from [좌표계].dbo.가로축 a cross join [좌표계].dbo.세로축 b where a.센터 between (126.980355-0.01) and (126.980355+0.01) and b.센터 between (37.566207-0.01) and (37.566207+0.01) and '13' = #{level} order by a.극서 asc
